name: Patience Is All You Need
descHash:
"Could it be that there's something you haven't told me?"

She watches as their neck stiffens, as if a lump is blocking their throat.
She knows she is feared, and that no further step is needed.
At this point, it no longer mattered what she said.
Any word she utters radiates horror...
They stand no chance against her, and have no choice but to blurt out what she wants to hear.

Like a spider waiting in its web, patience is all she needs.

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

549437.name: Thief's Instinct
549437.desc: A small amount of anti-matter. Crude material used for enhancement.
549437.lore:
A small amount of anti-matter that emanates out of the Voidranger: Reaver like the materialization of its destructive instinct.

"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."

633378.name: Usurper's Scheme
633378.desc: A moderate amount of anti-matter. Normal material used for enhancement.
633378.lore:
A moderate amount of anti-matter that floats around the Voidranger: Distorter. The amount of matter and anti-matter particles has reached a dangerous balance...

"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."
comeFrom: Antimatter Legion at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

635669.name: Obsidian of Dread
635669.desc: A fragment of dark matter captured from the void. Used to level up Traces slightly for Nihility characters.
635669.lore:
Nothing can prove its noumenon.
Touch gently to hear an unclear murmur from the shard.

"████ ██ █ █"

694487.name: Refined Aether
694487.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>6000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694487.lore:
A canister of aether that has been extracted and distilled using special procedures.

"The Garden looks forward to recreating a past glory, but it is a 'past glory' selected by them. Do you understand?"

694488.name: Condensed Aether
694488.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>2000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694488.lore:
A can of Aether refined through special techniques.

"Handle with care, do not drop or place pressure upon it. If damages and leaks occur, please refer to chapter II of the Leak Disaster Response Manual for emergency response."

694489.name: Sparse Aether
694489.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>500</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694489.lore:
An imaginary substance that shouldn't exist in reality. The basic material to create Light Cones.
The images contained in the Light Cones become clearer when infused with this substance.

"I see, so this is the supposed 'memoria' of the Garden of Recollection. No wonder the Memokeepers can set off on galactic voyages with memories."

717319.name: Conqueror's Will
717319.desc: Condensed anti-matter. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717319.lore:
Highly condensed anti-matter within the body of the Voidranger: Trampler. The moment of obliteration is the trumpet call for civilizations' destruction.

"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."
comeFrom: Antimatter Legion at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

836255.name: Obsidian of Obsession
836255.desc: A sizable piece of dark matter captured from the void. Used to level up Traces significantly for Nihility characters.
836255.lore:
The weak-minded and soft-willed will spend their eternity in chaos from just a simple glance into the prism.

" "

920196.name: Obsidian of Desolation
920196.desc: A chunk of dark matter captured from the void. Used to level up Traces moderately for Nihility characters.
920196.lore:
No reflections can be seen on the surface of the black prism. Not only does it suck in all the light, it seems to also absorb the wielder's emotions, leaving only a faint feeling of emptiness.

"..."

skill.name: Spider Web
skill.descHash:
Increases DMG dealt by the wearer by #2[i]%. After every attack launched by wearer, their SPD increases by #3[f1]%, stacking up to #4[i] times.
If the wearer hits an enemy target that is not afflicted by Erode, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Erode to the target. Enemies afflicted with Erode are also considered to be Shocked and will receive Lightning DoT at the start of each turn equal to #1[i]% of the wearer's ATK, lasting for #5[i] turn(s).
